dep_321: There's too much to do right now. Let's talk later.
assertivemed_comfort: Just ... had a bad day, is all ...
*Sigh* y_c, have you ever felt like you're not enough for anyone?
Usually, when it comes to making a decision, I never hesitate. Whatever the obstacle, I'll run headfirst into it, no questions asked.

But, today, in the medicine den, I took a risk on an experimental new procedure, and it completely backfired. Luckily, it didn't do much damage, but because of me, my patient could've been hurt, or worse.
I just feel like such a failure. A liability. Everyone in the clan is depending on me to keep them safe, but what if I keep falling short?
[You offer t_c words of reassurance, but they seem troubled beyond comforting.]
[Still, you sit with them through the night, hoping to stabilize them through whatever storm they might be weathering right now.]
medapp_1s5s: You're full of spirit, aren't you? I can't wait to see the cat you'll become.
assertive_jealous1: What did I do in a past life to wind up related to you, y_c?
assertive_4: Whoa! Watch where you're going there, little pal! One wrong move, and you might get stepped on!
Ah, quit that, you don't need to apologize. Just be a bit more careful from now on, is all.
Or else, when you get bigger, it'll really become a problem. Hehe!
assertive_tonewborn: Whoa! Hey there, little guy! Shouldn't you be in the nursery?
Hehe. You've got an adventurous spirit. I like that about you.
But for now, you gotta stay where it's safe! C'mon. Let's go back to your parents.
assertive_tonewborn_2: Little guy seems to be in good condition!
Welcome to the world, little y_c!
assertive_tonewborn1: Aw ... little guy hasn't even gotten their eyes open yet!
They're gonna be a killer, though. I can already tell. See those little paws? This kit's got fight in 'em!
assertive_tonewborn3: Whoa ... this is them? They're so small!
Hard to believe I was that small once ...
assertive_apprentice7: y_c. Buddy. Best friend. We've GOTTA TRY this. r_c told me that if you eat three mice, one rabbit, and howl at the moon, you get magic powers!
What? It's totally real, they wouldn't lie to me like that! I prommissseee.
assertive_1: Hey there, y_c! Not bad weather today, hm?
Sun on my pelt, wind in my fur ... Could you imagine being a kittypet and having to be cooped up in a twoleg nest all day? I think I would go crazy!
Just another reason why it's great to be a clan cat.
assertive_6: *Sigh*. Hey, y_c. Come to ruin the fun again?
Whatever. I'm going to go do something actually exciting. Don't wait up.
assertiveapp_leader: I'll make all of c_nClan proud!
assertiveapp_6: [t_c stumbles across camp to you, soaking wet and covered in mud.]
y_c! Before you get mad, I didn't do it!
[The very peeved-off looking deputy locks eyes with you and storms in your direction. What mischief did t_c get into this time?]
assertive_elder: y_c, can you believe it? I actually got to dress a real wound today! Eeee, so cool!!!
I mean, uh, definitely not cool. I'm definitely very serious and respectful towards my sacred duty to clan.
assertive_elder_2: Er, sorry, y_c. I can't chat right now ...
tm_n really needs me to sort the herb stores right now, and I kinda actually have to focus.
I'll come and find you as soon as I'm free, though, okay?
assertive_elder_3: Ahh! There's this new treatment I learned from this wandering healer that we've just gotta try ...
[t_c's eyes flash as they explain the method. They're always wanting to try out new and experimental herb combinations and procedures.]
[You try to entertain their crazy ideas because, more often than not, they actually end up working!]
assertive_elder_4: Eeek! The half-moon meeting is coming up! Aren't you excited?
Is it just me, or is it high time the o_cClan apprentice earns their full name? I hope their name ends in -cloud ... that would really suit them.
And the o_cClan medicine cat has been totally eyeing you at every gathering ... C'mon, don't tell me you haven't noticed!
Though, I suppose whatever they feel is between them and StarClan, teehee!
assertive_elder_5: Is it just me, or has r_w been coming into the medicine den an awful lot lately?
What? I'm just saying! I've seen the way they look at you!
Not like they're exactly bad looking either ... You could certainly do much worse!
Okay, okay, I'll stop now. Hehe!
assertive_app29: Tch. Did you see what a snake-heart r_c was acting like earlier? And over a piece of prey, no less!
Cat's so mouse-brained, probably can't even tell their own tail from a willow branch ...
... Whoa, what? Wait, you want me to apologize to them?
But they were in the wrong, not me! Why even entertain their behavior with an apology?
If they're mad, who cares! Let 'em stay mad! They can stay mad forever, for all I care!
Look, I know you're the mediator, and it's your job to resolve conflicts, or whatever, but ... you love me. Shouldn't you be on my side?
You'd really choose them over me?
assertive_app29_2: Let me guess. You've come to patch things up between me and r_c, 'cause of the fight we had earlier. That right?
I'll save you a few words - it's not gonna happen. Why's it always me that's gotta be in the wrong, huh? Why not force them to apologize?
Go find somebody else's problem to fix.
assertive_apprentice8: Hey, when do you think we'll be getting our full names?
D'you think, if we ask, the leader would give us matching suffixes? That happens sometimes with siblings, y'know!
How about ... -cloud for me, and -sneeze for you?
Or, -mouse for me, and -dung for you!
[You and t_c dissolve into a fit of giggles.]
assertivewarrior_deputy2: Yeah, right. Like I have to take orders from you!
You may think you're a warrior, but all you do is sit on your haunches and boss everyone around all day. That's no warrior. That's a coward.
Go find some other cat to impose on.
introspective_MedApp: [t_c is staring off into space, looking between some herbs]
... Oh! Oh, good morning, y_c. I'm sorry, I was looking at these herbs.
They're for travelling herbs, I'm trying to memorise what goes into it, since we make them a lot.
Yeah, staring at them doesn't look productive, but if I memorise them, I'll be able to make them quicker and without asking next time.
I've got to learn quickly, so I can do my job better.
introspective_MedApp_1: y_c? Afternoon. What's brought you to the medicine den? You don't look injured.
Oh, are those raspberries? Thank you for looking out for them.
They're really helpful herbs, but I don't normally ask people to look for them, the risk of them eating deathberries is really high.
I worry about people risking their lives for something I can do myself.
introspective_MedApp_2: You look... worried. Is there anything I can help with?
... I know you're not injured, but my job is to treat you, y_c. That includes your mental wounds. I know, I'm not great at talking, but that doesn't mean my ears don't work.
I'm still working on being a good future medicine cat, and learning to talk to people is part of that. So if it'll help, you coming to me with your problems is helping me learn.
So please, y_c, What can I help you with? What's on your mind?
introspective_MedApp_3: [t_c is sat staring at a chunk of spider web, wrapped around a twig.]
... oh yeah. I'm just looking at this web, I know we use them to clear injuries, but I love staring at them every now and then, they're so intricate.
Spiders spend such a long time working at these webs, and while they're incredibly helpful, I feel we really don't appreciate them enough.
Imagine, such tiny creatures making art, I wonder if they truly comprehend how wonderful their work is. I wonder if they know they're utterly irreplaceable.
Like you, y_c. This clan wouldn't be home without you.
introspective_MedApp_4: Oh, y_c? What's brought you to the medicine den? Is that a shrew?
Oh, you wanted to share your fresh kill with me? That's sweet, thank you. Let's eat it out in the clearing, so we're out of the way of my mentor looking after the patients.
... Thank you for sharing with me. It's nice knowing that other cats think about me enough to come out the way to spend time with me.
I became a medicine cat to heal my clan and to look after them, and... well, you coming to look after me means a whole lot.
... I've got to go back to the den now, so my mentor can get something to eat. I'll see you later?
introspective_MedApp_5: y_c? I'm sorry, I'm going to go search for some watermint for my mentor, I'm in a bit of a rush.
Huh, you want to come with me? You can do, of course, if you're not needed here. Would be nice to have the extra paws.
You know, I love going out looking for herbs, it's so quiet out here, it's so alive, yet so still. It's nice to get out of the stress of camp to just... breathe. You know?
I love my duties, I love being a medicine cat apprentice, I'm looking forward to the day where I get to press my nose to the moonstone and get my medicine cat name.

The camp's always a bit... much. I didn't think I'd need to interact with cats so much, but I suppose there isn't a path you can walk in the clan where you can avoid cats, I suppose that's the point of living together.
Even though not all of us are related, we're kin under c_nClan, we've all got a path to walk.
Oh! I think I see some watermint over there. We should get going, or we'll be out all day.
assertivemedcat_queen2: y_c, could you possibly go out and collect some more kitting sticks sometime? I keep forgetting to.
They'll need to be thick, hearty, and strong enough to withstand the wrath of a kitting queen! And you and I both know we don't want to face that wrath ourselves, hehe.
So get out there! Probably some good ones out at the edge of the territory.
assertivemedcat_queensapp3: How goes it, y_c? Ready for another herb lesson?
This leafy one here's called chervil. It's pretty common around the territory, and can be used for bellyaches and infected wounds. It's useful for kitting, too - that'll be good for you to remember.
Watch out for the juice, though! It carries, er, a less than desirable scent.
Come back when you're ready for your next training session!
assertivemedcat_queensapp3_2: How goes it, y_c? Ready for another herb lesson?
This one over here is called borage, and it helps nursing queens bring up their milk supply after they've kitted.
Hey, don't ask me how it works! I'm just the messenger.
Come back when you're ready for your next training session!
assertivemedcat_queensapp4: How goes it, y_c? Ready for another herb lesson?
These spiky leaves over here are raspberry leaves. They help ease a queen's pain while they're kitting.
And, trust me, when you're bringing a new life into the world, you'll need all the help you can get! Hehehe!
Come back when you're ready for your next training session!
assertive_tokit: Hey, y_c! I brought you back something from my last patrol. Take a look!
[t_c drops a colorful feather at your paws.]
You wanna know how I found it? Oh, it's a crazy story. I was on an herb gathering patrol, when I found this huge bird, and ...
[t_c regales you with a daring story full of thrills, twists, and turns.]
... And then I got the feather! Quite the adventure, no?
Just wait until you're old enough. You'll be having plenty of adventures of your own before you know it!
assertive_medapp: StarClan, these herbs are hard to memorize! I don't know how my mentor does it all!
No way am I passing my assessment tomorrow ...
assertivemedapp_tokit: Whoa! Watch it, little guy, or you'll trample my whole herb supply!
Hehe, no worries. Say, maybe this is a sign from StarClan. You're destined to be in the medicine den!
Or, maybe you're just clumsy, heh ... whatever the case, you might have a future as a medicine cat! It's definitely a unique and important path.
assertivemedapp_3: [You ask t_c why they chose to become a medicine cat, given their adventurous personality.]
Ah, well, that's easy ... The medicine den is full of adventure!
I get to explore far and wide gathering all sorts of different herbs, collaborate with medicine cats across territories, and literally commune with the dead! That's plenty of excitement, no?
You might think you know life-or-death situations on the battlefield, but here in the medicine den is where the stakes are really high.
My decisions could be the difference between a clanmate surviving, or joining our warrior ancestors.
There's lots of different paths a cat can take in this world, but I know this is the path for me. Can you say the same?
assertivemedapp_5: Don't worry, pal. I'll get you patched up in no time ...
assertivemedapp_6: Heyy, there's my favorite patient! Doing better today, pal?
That's good. Hey, get this. Today, when I was gathering herbs, I saw this huge hawk ...
[t_c's silly jokes and good nature put you at ease, but their lashing tail betrays that they may be more stressed than they let on ...]
assertivemedapp_7: Hey. Bet I could beat ya in a fight!
Sure, I have no formal training, but once I let my inner demons out ...
[t_c does an exaggerated growl and you both explode with laughter.]
Y-You're lucky I'm a lover, not a fighter! *Wheeze*
assertive_dislike1: Sorry, is someone talking to me right now?
assertive_dislike1_2: Can't you see I'm busy, mousebrain? Go bother someone else!
assertive_dislike1_4: Hey, y_c. You're looking smaller than usual. Maybe it's time to catch up on your training.
assertive_jealous1_2: Hey, so, remember when you cracked that joke today, and everybody laughed, and then I tried to be funny, and no one laughed?
... What was the deal with that?
assertive_elder_8: *Sigh* Can't you see I have more important things to do, y_c?
Go back to catching mice, or whatever.
assertive_apprentice4: y_c! y_c! You gotta come check out this new part of the territory I found! It's, like, the coolest place ever!

Okay, first, we have to scale up these rocks, and they're sort of slippery, but it's okay, cuz I only fell, like, twice. Next, we have to cross a river, and I'm pretty sure there's snakes in there, so watch out! Then, we have to ...
Aw, c'mon, don't look all nervous. It'll be fun! What's life without a little danger, right?
assertivemedapp_8: Hm? This herb? Oh, it's lavender.
Its soothing scent is used to mask the smell of death ... kinda nice, huh?
You kinda smell like lavender sometimes, y_c. Has anyone ever told you that?
Well ... now you know, I guess. Heh.
assertivemedapp_9: Maybe if I'd just been a little faster, or used a different combination of herbs, then ...
Is it too late to switch to a warrior apprentice? I ... I don't know if I'm fit to be a medicine cat.
assertivemedapp_10: Hey, there you are! What do you need today? Something to cure your ills? I got everything you need, hehe ...
[t_c is still cracking jokes, but their voice is strained, clearly tainted with the memory of d_c ... They don't seem to be taking the loss well.]
assertivemedapp_11: Ugh. Why can't I hear them, y_c? It's not fair!
I haven't received any omens or dreams in ages! When's it finally gonna happen? Has StarClan given up on me?
[You do your best to assure t_c that it will happen in time. They huff and lash their tail irritability. It seems 'patient' isn't exactly their style.]
assertivemedapp_12: d_c isn't really gone, right? We - We can still save them?
We can still save them, right, y_c? Just - Just let me save them. Please. If you'll just let me, I - I can - Oh, StarClan -
[t_c breaks, completely inconsolable. Their sobs ... you never knew a sound so empty and heartbreaking could come from a cat so young.]
[You press them into your shoulder, hoping to guide them through the heartbreak of losing a patient, a heartbreak you've felt yourself too many times.]
assertivemedapp_13: Okay, so horsetail is for infections, and so is comfrey ... wait. Um ... is that right?
Ugh, I'm never gonna get this! It's one leaf versus another leaf, how am I supposed to tell them apart?!
[t_c storms out of the medicine den, obviously frustrated. You really need to talk to them about their temper ...]
assertivemedapp_13_2: Hey, y_c! What are we doing today?
Learning how to staunch wounds? Ahh, that's so cool!!! *Ahem* Sorry. I mean, not cool. I mean, very serious.
Um, when can we get started?
assertivemedapp_13_3: Look ath thith huuuuge patch oth comfthy I got!
[t_c spits out their wad of comfrey. It seems, in their excitement, they accidentally bit through some of the leaves and destroyed them.]
Lesson learned. Don't talk with herbs in the mouth.
silly_medapp_hysterical: [You enter camp after an utterly weird border exhibition and see t_c's horrible attempt at a greeting through what seems like hysterical laughter.]
y_c! HAH! You just missed- *giggle* You just missed the FUNNIEST thing I've ever seen!
There was- there was a frog on the medicine den, and- hahaHAHAHA- and then it- and then it- oh Silverpelt, the frog- it did-
It did a backflip and it landed on r_m's head! You should've seen the look on their- HAHA!
[You truly can't tell if t_c's mentor, r_m, is upset or amused. Either way, they seem to have already gone back to sorting herbs.]
silly_medapp_bush: [The medicine cat asked you to meet t_c in the medicine den at sun-high so that they could practice their check-up skills.]
[However, when you enter the den, you notice that the medicine cat is nowhere in sight ...]
[ ... and t_c has fashioned a bunch of dark, crumbling plants onto their pelt so thickly that you almost can't see their fur.]
[They're sitting very still in the corner of the den, so you try to greet them, assuming they just didn't see you walk in.]
Shh! I'm a bush, can't you tell?
If I'm a bush, then maybe the herbs won't see the cats coming, and they'll grow more!
silly_medapp_gathering: Hi, y_c! Don't worry, I don't need to be looking at you to hear what you're saying. I understand you perfectly fine, I'm just fixing herb stacks!
So, what've you been up to? Ooh, wait - you went to the last Gathering, what juicy stuff happened there?
[Upon their request, you tell t_c all about the last Gathering. It wasn't very eventful, in your honest opinion.]
Awh, man. Well, maybe it's good that nothing cool happened. I'm already busy, forget what would happen if cats started fighting!
...Don't let me jinx it. Don't let me jinx it, please!
silly_medapp_stomach: [Wanting to greet t_c, you walk slowly into the medicine den to see if they're in there. Indeed, they are, but they're shifting around on the floor as if they're trying to subdue pain.]
Oh, y_c! It sure would suck if someone grabbed some chervil root for my stomach!
Seriously, I don't know what I would do! y_c!
[You grab what you think is the right herb, judging by the smell and familiar taste, and give some to t_c, wondering why it has to be you of all cats to do this for them.]
[t_c gets up with no issue and walks into the elders' den. They come back a few minutes later with empty jaws.]
Hah, no, of course I don't need it for myself. I just saw you walk in and wanted to see if you would actually do it.
silly_medapp_question: Oh, hello, y_c! Ya know, I had a question I wanted to ask you earlier.
If you could go back in time and change the path you went on as an apprentice, would you do that?
I don't think I would. I'm happy here. It's difficult, and I have my worries, but it's worth it.
Sometimes I look at all my sick Clanmates and worry I may not be able to help them. But then I look at my mentor, and I know everything will be okay with them guiding me.
Oh, woah, that's a lot more serious than I thought it would be. I just said things, haha... Uh, marigold's the heather?
Fox-dung! How's the weather? I mean that.
Uh, hold on. I think I just heard my mentor calling me!
[You feel the heat coming from t_c's pelt as they embarrassedly pad away to hide in the medicine den.]
sweet_medapp_1: Oh, you're so tiny!! I've never gotten to see a newborn before.. And- oh- you're laying on my paw now.
[They blink, looking around for assistance, then chuckle awkwardly as they realize no one is going to help them.]
I guess I'm stuck here now.
sweet_medapp_2: Oh, y_c- don't eat that- that's a nasty herb. That'll make you feel super sick!
Why do we have it then? Uhhh... I dunno- I should ask... But how about instead, you have this? It's honey!
Honey can be really bad for you in big doses, so just have a little lick, alright? Not too much!
sweet_medapp_3: Oh hey there, little buddy! Would you like to learn about this herb?
It's called poppy seed. It helps when you're feeling super bad, and need a little bit of rest. Don't take it without supervision, okay?
And this one is garlic! It gets rid of nasty stuff when you're bitten by things... but it smells super bad!
Oh, and this is- ... oh, you fell asleep. Hehe, let's get you back to the Nursery, then.
sweet_medapp_4: Oh, y_c! Why are you crying? What's upsetting you, little buddy?
Do I have an herb for feeling sad? Well, let's see... Ah, I think this'll do just fine! Blackberries and raspberries are sure to ease the sadness and lift your spirit!
Though, it might make your fur a bit colorful, hehe.
sweet_medapp_5: Hey y_c! Would you like to see something cool? I found this really neat looking herb.
It's white lavender!! I've never seen lavender be any other color but purple... Ah, don't eat it! I've been told it's toxic... but it's super cool!
sweet_medapp_6: Now how did you end up here, hmm?
Oh, I see, you snuck in here and had too much honey? Well, try not to do that, it could've been something toxic!
Here you go, hehe. That should help with your bellyache... now get some rest, you're gonna need to sleep some of it off.
sweet_medapp_7: Hm, y_c? You and r_a need someone to tally up points for a competition?
Sure thing! I'll bring some snacks too. Oh, and some herbs in case anyone gets hurt, of course!
sweet_medapp_8: Ah, y_c! Thanks for seeing me, I wanted to know how r_k was doing?
Ah, I see. A small cold... not too unusual for a little one. Here, have these, they should help out some!
sweet_medapp_9: Ah, y_c! Have you seen the yarrow anywhere?! It's important!
Oh thank StarClan you threw it out...!
Some of the kits got into the Medicine Den, and all of our yarrow was missing.
sweet_medapp_10: [t_c seems really upset, sitting there as two cats argue in their den. Looks like a job for you!]
Oh thank StarClan, I need your help, y_c! These two won't stop arguing, and they aren't listening to a word I'm saying!
One of them has a raspy throat... I'm really worried... They might hurt themselves if they keep shouting like that!
You'll help? Thank you so much! Let me go get some honey for that sore throat.. It can't be feeling good right now.
sweet_medapp_11: Oh, y_c! I need your help with something, if you aren't too busy?
tm_n is busy right now, but I have to go out and collect herbs.
I'd rather not go alone... can you come with me? I understand if not, but the others are super busy right now.
sweet_medapp_12: Ah- y_c!! Are you okay? That looked like a nasty fall...
Here, let me take a look, okay? I'll be as fast as I can!
Mmm... Alright, you look okay! Just seems to be bruising a bit. Please be more careful, alright? I- I know I'm just an apprentice, but it's important!
sweet_medapp_13: Hey y_c, I have a question if that's alright?
What's it like being a warrior? I can't imagine wanting to fight anyone, it's why I chose being a medicine cat! Even back when I was a kit, I heard some kits saying I'd be too soft to be a warrior..
I sometimes wonder if they were wrong... Don't get me wrong, I'd never change the path I chose but... I don't know.
sweet_medapp_14: Oh y_c, I have a question if that's alright?
I've always kinda wondered... Why'd you choose to become a Medicine Cat? I know why I chose to, I don't like the thought of hurting anyone and have always had a love for herbs, but... what about you?
sweet_medapp_15: Ah, y_c! Just the cat who I was looking for!
r_k had a fight with another one of the kits... they um- they tore up the Medicine Den... think you could talk to them about it?
Actually- wait-! I.. have a small question.
What made you choose the path of a mediator? I know a lot of cats would prefer to serve their whole life hunting and fighting, or healing with herbs like me... But you choose differently... why?
sweet_medapp_16: [You lay there, r_k curled up by your side, watching as the day goes by. They tired themselves out playing all sorts of games, and you felt exhausted having to keep up with them, but it was worth it for such a fun day.]
[You closed your eyes for a second, and now t_c is here, staring at you with round eyes.]
I brought the herbs like you asked me to. Hopefully this should suffice! Gotta make sure those cuties grow up big and strong.
[t_c's eyes flicker over to the kitten by your side, they have a warm smile on their expression as they look back at you.]
Is this why you chose to become a queen? This moment of peace...? It's... really nice. It almost makes me want to go up to l_n and ask to swap roles, hehe.
Ah... I could never take care of all of the clan's kits like this... especially not all day every day... but it does seem really nice. Maybe one day I'll have my own kits to take care of.
I /do/ love caring for others after all, hehe. I get teased about it all the time! Especially by r_a!
sweet_medapp_17: Oh, are you sending out patrols, y_c?
I need to go herb gathering, but tm_n is really busy. Could you send r_c with me, please?
Thank you so much! I'll see if I can find something nice while I'm out as a 'thank you' gift!
[Before you can say that you don't really need to be thanked that much for that, they bound off. At least they're happy?
brooding_medapp_2: [t_c glances at you, their tail flicking in annoyance.]
The medicine den is no place for kits like you. Go on back to the nursery.
[They turn back to their herbs, shuffling through the stores. It stays quiet for a couple moments as you make no efforts to move.]
*Sigh* ... Fine. I guess you can stay.
But absolutely no touching the herbs!
brooding_medapp_3: What is it, y_c? Are you hurt? Sick?
The medicine den is far too busy for perfectly healthy cats to be taking up space.
brooding_medapp_4: [t_c sits in the medicine den with their eyes squeezed shut, seemingly searching for something in the darkness.]
brooding_medapp_5: You ... want to know if there's anything you can do to help out around the medicine den?
Hm. Well, if you're really that desperate, I ... suppose you could bring us some fresh moss?
brooding_medapp_6: Do c_nClan a favor and try not to pull any stupid stunts out there today.
The medicine den is crowded enough without apprentices injuring themselves for foolish reasons.
brooding_medapp_7: Pah. Scram, kit! You're messing up the herb stores ...
brooding_medapp_8: The medicine den is no place for a kit ...
Go back to the nursery, where you're safe.
brooding_medapp_9: [You've heard stories about the mean, grumpy medicine cat apprentice of c_nClan, and decide to pay them a visit.]
You ... want to know what I'm doing?
[You flinch, expecting the worst ... but, to your surprise, t_c actually softens.]
Heh. You're very curious. That's good. I wish I were more curious, at your age.
Right now, I'm sorting herbs. Do you want to see?
[t_c spends the rest of the afternoon patiently explaining the herbs and their properties to you. Maybe you have a future in the medicine den when you're older?]
brooding_medapp_10: *Sigh* What did you do to yourself this time, y_c?
Hold still ... Tell me where it hurts.
[For their brooding and stoic demeanor, t_c's touch is surprisingly gentle ...]
brooding_medapp_11: *Sigh* What did you do to yourself this time, y_c?
Hold still ... Tell me where it hurts.
[For their brooding and stoic demeanor, t_c's touch is surprisingly gentle ...]
brooding_medapp_12: y_c, I changed the moss in all the nests, and gathered some extra to hold water for our patients.
[You praise t_c for their tenacity! They blush and look away, clearly trying to hide how thrilled they are by the compliment.]
brooding_medapp_13: y_c, r_w just came in with a thorn in their paw. They're waiting for you now.
What? You want ... me to treat them?
Like, all by myself? Are you sure?
Um ... Okay. I'll try, I guess.
[t_c successfully, if a little clumsily, removes the thorn from r_w's paw, even remembering to apply the right herbs to avoid infection after.]
[r_w compliments them on their gentle touch.]
Heh ... S'No problem ... Just doing my job.
[t_c looks at you, grinning from ear to ear.]
brooding_medapp_14: You ... want us to do a bonding exercise, to get to know each other better as mentor and apprentice?
[t_c stalks off before you can even finish explaining the exercise. Clearly, you'll need to find another way of getting through to them ...]
brooding_medapp_15: [You notice your apprentice is looking a little stressed, and ask them how they're feeling.]
Look, can we get one thing straight, y_c? I'm your apprentice, you're my mentor, that's it. That's all this has to be.
We don't need to get into any of the 'feelings' stuff, because it really isn't necessary. Got it?
[They storm off, lashing their tail. If that isn't the most brutal little cat you've ever met in your life ...]
sweet_medapp_18: Hey, y_c? I really need to speak with l_n, are they busy right now?
Mm.. Okay! Thank you! I'll let you know what we're speaking about once I get back, but it's pretty urgent!
sweet_medapp_19: Oh, y_c! There you are! You've been working so much today, I've barely gotten a chance to catch up!
I had something important to tell you- oh wait, I think tm_n is calling me. You stay there a second, I'll be right back!
[It appears t_c just tricked you into taking a break, knowing you wouldn't take one willingly.]
sweet_medapp_20: Um... y_c? Can I come in?
[You see the fuzzy face of t_c in the doorway. They seem pretty startled about something, their fur standing on end and their ears pinned back.]
[You invite them inside, it's not normal to see the typically sweet cat so bothered by something.]
[They meet your eyes, letting out a deep breath as they say...]
I think I just got my first prophecy.
sweet_medapp_21: Ah, y_c! Quick, I need your help!
[You rush over to the medicine cat apprentice, startled to see them so serious.]
r_w is starting to get really sick! Everyone else is out of camp and I can't carry them by myself. Can you please help me?
sweet_medapp_22: [Your gaze is fixated on the sky, watching the stars shimmer in the night sky. You're focused, the day having been a stressful one, when a voice breaks the silence.]
[You feel like you should be the one asking t_c that, they are the apprentice here, after all. When did they get so mature?]
[They climb up next to you, stumbling a bit and reminding you of their apprentice status, but eventually they make it up next to you.]
Today was pretty rough... I hope you're taking care of yourself! After all, we still have tomorrow to look forward to. I'm betting it'll go way better than today did.
I don't need a prophecy or a sign to know things will get better.
sweet_medapp_23: [t_c enters the den, a bundle of herbs tightly clamped in their jaws. They brighten as they wander over to you, placing the mixture of herbs on the ground in front of you.]
Good evening, y_c! I've brought you your herbs for today. I also brought you a snack too, in case you were getting hungry!
sweet_medapp_24: [y_c tends to r_c as you sit in the Medicine Den, humming as they work. They've really grown into their role, even in the short time. It was pretty impressive, honestly.]
Aaaaalright! That should be all! Now y_c, what seems to be the problem today?
[You explain what your issues are, and then question where tm_n is.]
We had a bit of a wasp problem, and tm_n is checking the warriors who dealt with it. I'm on regular tasks until then! Now then, let me see what I have for that...
sweet_medapp_25: [You wake up from a nightmare about your past, your heart beating rapidly. You haven't been able to sleep well in moons, and finally admit to yourself that you need help.]
[You go to the Medicine Cat's Den, finding that only t_c seems to be awake.]
Huh, y_c?? What are you doing up at this hour? ... Oohhh... I understand.
[They set up a nest in the den just for you, grabbing some herbs to help you sleep.]
Don't take too many of them, okay? I'll talk to tm_n in the morning about what we should do. In the meantime, would you mind telling me a story? Just to get your mind off things.
upstanding_medapp: Oh, there you are! Sorry I haven't been here to help, I got a little sidetracked.
With what? Well, you know how you told me the other day that the most hardworking medicine cats are often more successful?
So I may have gotten a bit inspired and well...
How much room do we have in the herb store?
upstanding_medapp1: Hey there y_c! Is it alright if I give you a checkup? Make sure everything is alright?
Yes, I'm doing this again. It's called a 'routine checkup' for a reason! Besides, m_n said that the best way to learn something is just to start doing it, so here I am!
I might have my paws full with all of this, but it's worth it if it means becoming a medicine cat! And helping the clan. That too of course.
upstanding_medapp2: [You turn to see t_c hiding towards the back of the camp, beckoning you to come closer.]
Look, I need your help with something. I need you to come on a mission with me to get more cobwebs from o_cClan territory. It's urgent.

Don't stare at me like that! I know it's against the code, but the health and safety of my clanmates matter so much more to me. I wouldn't be doing this at all if I didn't feel like it's important, you know that.
And I need you to come with me just in case we do happen to meet some enemy warriors out there. You're a mediator, they'll listen to you! I think.
Ok, you're a mediator-in-training, but what's the difference? Besides, m_n would never agree to this! That's why I'm asking you.
Please help me, I swear by StarClan that I wouldn't do this if there was any other way.
upstanding_medapp3: [t_c is looking around cautiously, making sure that no one is eavesdropping in on the conversation.]
I know that I'm really not supposed to tell you what StarClan tells me in my dreams, but... technically, if I don't tell you exactly what they said, then it's not breaking any rules. Technically.
Besides, this is important. Really important.
Just... make sure that you stick to the right path, ok? Stick to what the Warrior Code has taught us; don't stray too far away. Remember what c_nClan has taught you. I need you to trust me on this.

I have to go now. I told t_mn that I would be dropping some herbs for r_k at the nursery, and they'll be expecting me to be back soon. Just remember what I said. You still have a chance to do the right thing.
upstanding_medapp4: [t_c is staring intently at the wall of herbs in the medicine den, mumbling under their breath.]
[It seems like they're trying to memorize each and every one. Now that's determination.]
newborn_frommedapp: I never expected kittens to be this small when they're born. They're like a little pebble... that meows.
neurotic_app4: Gah, stupid, stupid, so stupid, t_c ...
Wuh - y_c? How long have you been standing there?
Why was I talking to myself ...?
*Sigh* It's, like, the dumbest thing ever. t_mn gave me this surprise assessment today, and I totally flunked it!
How could I have answered that yarrow is the best treatment for a toothache? It doesn't even make any sense!
I just know that t_mn is still laughing at me ... the whole Clan probably is.
[You tell t_c not to be so hard on themself.]
But, if I'm not hard on myself, then how will I ever become stronger?
I refuse to be an embarrassment to my Clan and mentor. I'll pass that assessment next time ... Whatever it takes!
neurotic_app2: [t_c watches tm_n apprehensively from across camp.]
Do you think tm_n even likes me?
It seems like, every new skill they try and teach me, I always seem to mess it up somehow ...
I just hope I'm not making them look like a bad mentor.
you_starving_5: [You look over to see t_c coming over to you, a bundle of herbs wrapped in a leaf in their mouth. They gently place the package down next to you.]
Listen, I've noticed that... well you're not doing okay. This starvation is awful for the body and the mind. I've been thinking about it since yesterday, and I decided to make some herb bundles.

They're normally for traveling, but I suppose in a morbid sense this is its own kind of adventure. Please will you eat them? I've made a bundle for all the cats that need it, so you don't need to worry that you're taking herbs off of someone else.
In case you're wondering, it's a mixture of honey, chamomile and willow herb, and wrapped in a laurel leaf.
... there we go. Thank you y_c. Hopefully there will be more fresh-kill soon.
